title: [Discussion] KCET R3 BOIS WHERE YOU STAYING ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­
content: The hostel within the college is full, and outside hostel costs 2.2 Lakhs for 10 months. I searched all the nearby PGs today, and all are absolute garbage.

comments.body:
Which hostel is taking 2.2L a month boss? 
I will reccomended looking for apartments if you can and don't restrict yourself to just area near college , you can look at areas 2 stations away from mysore road metro station as well , you can even look for PGs that are close to metros or bus stops
Ya !! Pg aren't good enough ðŸ¤§
Yeah same situation. If you find any good pg inform me as well
